name: Stardust Defenders
description:
Stardust Defenders is a minimalist Tower Defense with roguelike elements, bullet hell and constant action, where you must defend the Ancient Tree against the hordes of corrupted creatures that seek to destroy it. To do this, you will have the help of different forest spirits as well as powerful guardians, while you increase your powers by recovering essence from fallen enemies.

- You can play with mouse, keyboard or joystick.
- 7 guardians to unlock and test.
- 14 forest spirits to experiment with.
- 15 upgrades to increase your power before each game.
- Even more options to increase your power within each game.
